amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding tribal colleges and universities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2831 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2831 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2655-2656; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2656) To express the sense of the Senate regarding tribal colleges and universities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2831 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2831 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Conrad.
